crossword.logic

Class WordFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • crossword.logic.WordFinder

  • public class WordFinder
extends Object
    The core of the program. Finds words for all WordPositions on the board.
    Author:
    Vanamo Piirainen

    • Method Detail

      • findWordsForAllPositions

        public BoardOfWords findWordsForAllPositions(CustomArrayList<WordPosition> positions)
        Finds words for all positions given as an ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        positions - all word positions on the board
        Returns:
        the resulting BoardOfWords, null if no solution is found

      • findWords

        public CustomArrayList<String> findWords(WordPosition newPosition)
        Finds all words that fit to the given position.
        Parameters:
        newPosition - the position where to find a fitting word
        Returns:
        list of all the fitting words

      • getTimesVisitedAtPosition

        public CustomArrayList<Integer> getTimesVisitedAtPosition()
        Returns:
